36.title: Rob Delaney
36.plot: This week, Comedian and Twitter heavyweight Rob Delaney (@robdelaney) joins Joan In Bed! In this episode, they chat about him being the "King of Twitter", his beginnings in Musical Theater and his turn towards Comedy, driving into a building while drunk, Michael Douglas' oral sex habits, and how meeting Bill Cosby was like a dream.

37.title: Dan Bucatinsky
37.plot: This week, Emmy Award winning actor and writer Dan Bucatinsky joins Joan In Bed. In this episode, they talk about winning an Emmy for his guest role on ABC's "Scandal", playing gay while he's gay, his book "Does This Baby Make Me Look Straight?", and writing as a "Jewish-hypochondriac" on Gray's Anatomy.

38.title: Paul Scheer
38.plot: This week, comedian Paul Scheer (@paulscheer) jumps into Bed With Joan! In this episode, they chat about Paul's experience as the "Head Page" on 30 Rock, "The Smallest Cock In Porn", hiring a Jack Nicholson impersonator to be the best man at his wedding, Paul's podcast "How Did This Get Made?" (about terrible movies), and most importantly, butt implants.

39.title: Billy Eichner
39.plot: In this episode, Billy Eichner from Fuse's "Billy On The Street" joins Joan In Bed! In this episode, they chat about when Billy came out to his parents, the difference between Meryl Streep and Glenn Close, Why Billy aspires to be Lisa Rinna, and what is strange about the rapper Nas.

40.title: Jen Kirkman
40.plot: This week, comedian Jen Kirkman (@JenKirkman) jumps into Bed With Joan! In this episode, they talk about Jen not wanting to have kids (as discussed in her new book), her work in "Drunk History", why comedians are great actors, and how she knew before anyone else that George Clooney and Stacy Keibler broke up!

41.title: Shiri Appleby
41.plot: This week, Shiri Appleby joins Joan in Bed! In this episode, they talk about the meanings of their names, Shiri's new baby, the beginning of Shiri's career, and the saga of Lena Dunham's chest.

42.title: iJustine
42.plot: This week, iJustine a.k.a Justine Ezarik (@iJustine) jumps into Bed with Joan! In this episode, they talk about what nationality is the hottest, how life-streaming changed her life and pushed out her roommate, the perils of having miners as family members, and Joan gets into the video game spirit by putting on some Minecraft socks!

43.title: Reza Farahan
43.plot: This week, Reza Farahan from Bravo's "Shahs of Sunset" jumps into Bed with Joan! In this episode (with glasses of wine) they chat about the specificity of Reza's ethnicity, Reza's biggest sale ever and who he supports with his income, how to scare people in Santa Monica, and things get a little political!

44.title: Loni Love
44.plot: This week, Loni Love - @LoniLove (Comedian and host of "The Real"), jumps into Bed With Joan! In this episode, they talk about the trouble of making friends as a female comic, what to do when people start hitting you up for money, her book "Love Him or Leave Him", and when to avoid shaking hands with fans.

45.title: Bonnie McKee
45.plot: This week, singer/songwriter Bonnie McKee (@bonniemckee) jumps into Bed With Joan! In this episode, Bonnie talks about writing for Katy Perry and Ke$ha, walking out on Chris Brown, and even having sexy dreams about Justin Bieber!

46.title: Paul Rodriguez
46.plot: This week, comedian Paul Rodriguez jumps into Bed With Joan! In this episode, they talk about comedy that plays to Mexicans, how Paul got into comedy after getting drafted into the Army, Paul's famous skateboarding son Paul Rodriguez Jr, and doing comedy for the prisoners in San Quentin State Prison!

47.title: George Kotsiopoulos
47.plot: This week, fashion personality George Kotsiopoulos joins Joan In Bed! In this episode, they chat about George's rise to fame, what happens to friends when you critique their wardrobe, payola in the red carpet fashion industry, and check out George's new book "Glamorous by George: The Key to Creating Movie Star Style"

48.title: Kathy Griffin
48.plot: This week, Kathy Griffin (@kathygriffin) jumps Into Bed With Joan! In part one, they chat about what's under Kathy's pajamas, Bruce Jenner's plastic surgery, getting in trouble with the LGBT community, Walter Cronkite's fetishes, and Kathy's secret feud with Barbara Walters! Don't forget - come back next week for part two!

49.title: Kathy Griffin and Aubrey Plaza: Part 2
49.plot: In this hilarious conclusion to Episode 48, Aubrey Plaza joins Joan In Bed with Kathy Griffin! In this second part, they chat about who to have sex with to have a better career in Hollywood, when Aubrey got a stroke in college, and the pleasures of getting arrested.

50.title: Jeff Ross
50.plot: This week, Jeff Ross (@realjeffreyross) joins Joan In Bed! In this episode, they chat about Jeff being the "Great Roastmaster" and making Bea Arthur cry, Jeff's beginnings in stand up comedy, his addiction to Twitter, why pain makes you prepared for show business, and don't miss Jeff's new show "The Burn" on Comedy Central!

51.title: Chris Hardwick
51.plot: This week, Chris Hardwick (@nerdist - The Nerdist himself!) jumps into Bed With Joan! In this episode, they chat about Chris' "Nerdist" media empire, writing comedy when you're too busy to, making death funny, Joan being unbanned from The Tonight Show, and make sure to watch Chris host "@midnight" every Monday - Thursday at 12am on Comedy Central!

52.title: Michaela Watkins
52.plot: This week, Michaela Watkins from ABC's "Trophy Wife" joins Joan in Bed! In this episode, watch how Joan reminisces about a her weekend spent with Kim and Kanye (check out the video thumbnail)! Michaela and Joan chat about Michaela's busy career, getting out of Syracuse, getting fired from SNL, and some of Michaela's favorite people to work with! And don't forget to watch Michaela in "Trophy Wife", Tuesdays at 9:30pm on ABC!

53.title: Bob Saget
53.plot: This week, Bob Saget (@bobsaget) joins Joan In Bed! In this episode, they chat about Bob being a dirty-but-nice guy, being inspired by Charlie Chaplin and other legendary comics, screening videos for "America's Funniest Home Videos", and don't forget to check out Bob's new book "Dirty Daddy"!

54.title: Patti Stanger
54.plot: This week, Patti Stanger - @pattistanger (of Bravo's "The Millionaire Matchmaker") jumps Into Bed With Joan! In this episode, they chat about some of Patti's worst clients, the particulars of the wants of men and women, why Patti hasn't gotten married yet, and why Joan had trouble as Melissa's own matchmaker!

55.title: Jenna Marbles
55.plot: This week, Jenna Marbles (@Jenna_Marbles) jumps Into Bed With Joan! In this episode, they chat about why Jenna's normal last name ruined her mom, the beginnings of her breakout YouTube channel, her Masters Degree in Sports Psychology and Counseling, and Jenna's "FACE".

56.title: Lennon Parham & Jessica St. Clair
56.plot: This week, Lennon Parham & Jessica St. Clair (the creators and stars of "Playing House" on USA Network) jump In Bed With Joan! In this episode, they chat about the terrors of childbirth, making it in New York with The UCB Theatre, the triumph of selling 2 shows together, and watch their new show "Playing House" on USA Network, Tuesdays at 10pm!

57.title: King Bach & Bart Baker
57.plot: This week, Internet Celebrities King Bach (@KingBach) and Bart Baker (@BartBaker) jump into bed with Joan! In this episode, they all chat about their beginnings in online video, the comedy power of 6 seconds on Vine, and their work with song parodies!

58.title: Greg Fitzsimmons
58.plot: This week, Greg Fitzsimmons (@GregFitzShow) joins Joan In Bed! In this episode, they talk about being a "comic's comic", Greg's four Emmys for working on "Ellen", dealing with hecklers, and check out Greg's book "Dear Mrs. Fitzsimmons"!

59.title: Mamrie Hart
59.plot: This week, Mamrie Hart (From "You Deserve A Drink" and "Mametown" on Youtube) jumps In Bed With Joan! In this episode, they chat about Mamrie's fake eulogies for celebrities, using Visine to get back at bar customers, and her band "Cudzoo And The Faggettes"!

60.title: Tom Papa
60.plot: This week, Comedian Tom Papa (@tompapa) joins Joan In Bed! In this episode, they chat about being busy as a comedian, developing a network show from a single TV appearance, the trails and tribulations of "The Marriage Ref", and don't miss his new show "Duck Quacks Don't Echo" on NatGeo!

61.title: Hannah Hart
61.plot: This week, Hannah Hart (@harto) From "My Drunk Kitchen" jumps In Bed With Joan! In this episode, they talk about the wasteland of Los Angeles, getting a college degree in Japanese and Japanese lesbians, the process of creating an episode of "My Drunk Kitchen", and don't miss Hannah's new My Drunk Kitchen book, coming this August!

62.title: Jason Biggs
62.plot: This week, Jason Biggs jumps In Bed With Joan! In this episode, they chat about getting started as a child actor and the theater, getting recognized from "American Pie", and how "Orange Is The New Black" changed his life!

63.title: Meghan McCain
63.plot: This week, Meghan McCain jumps In Bed With Joan! In this episode, they chat about her years in formal education, her dating life, being the political Chelsea Handler, and don't miss her show "Take Part Live" on Pivot.tv!

64.title: TJ Miller
64.plot: This week, TJ Miller (@nottjmiller) joins Joan In Bed! In this episode, they chat about their beginnings in Second City, how oatmeal changed his career, and make sure to watch TJ on "Silicon Valley" on HBO!

65.title: Scott Aukerman
65.plot: This week, Scott Aukerman from Comedy Bang! Bang! on IFC jumps In Bed With Joan! In this episode, they chat about Scott's beginnings in writing, writing comedy for President Obama, the trouble with working with Justin Bieber, and one of the meanest April Fools Jokes ever!

imdb.title: In Bed with Joan
plot: A 30 minute no holds barred chat with comedian Joan Rivers.::Anonymous
